        Buys the selected customisation and adds it to the player's inventory

        index - The position of the currently selected, non-customised roboticon

      • refreshCurrentlySelectedRoboticon

        private void refreshCurrentlySelectedRoboticon()
        Sets the appearance of the current roboticon on the market screen. This is based on the customisation of the selected roboticon as well as the ID number

        number - The number that the string starts with
        length - The number of zeros that the number is followed by

        The string that has been generated
